Title: The Kidney in Liver Disease
Author: মুরী ইপেস্টিন এমডি এফএসিপি
Summary:
The Kidney in Liver Disease, 4e (Books)
This book is the fourth edition of Dr. Epsteins widely acclaimed work on the renal complications of liver disease. It includes contributions from recognized international authorities in the field. The book constitutes an unparalleled source of information about abnormalities of kidney function.

Title: Common Foot Problems in Primary Care
Author: রির্চাড বি. বিরার এমডি
Summary:
Common Foot Problems in Primary Care
Albert Einstein College of Medicine, Brooklyn, NY. Reference on the care of healthy and diseased feet, for primary care physicians. Written by a physician and several podiatrists. Halftone photographs, images and line drawings. Previous edition: c1992. 9 U.S. contributors. DNLM: Foot--physiopathology.
Book_Title: Common Foot Problems in Primary Care

Title: Handbook of Dialysis Therapy
Author: অ্যালেন আর. নিশিনশন এমডি এফএসিপি
Summary:
Handbook of Dialysis Therapy
Here's an in-depth, quick-reference, problem-solving resource for those involved in the care of dialysis patients. More than 120 world-class authorities discuss dialysis techniques, mechanical considerations, and complications related to various diseases for both pediatric and adult patients. Selected annotated references and excellent cross-referencing between chapters help you find answers fast, and more than 100 photos, drawings, charts, and tables, mostly in color, clarify complex topics. Providing practical, immediately useful guidelines that can be applied directly to patient care, this book is a "must-have" for all dialysis caregivers. 
Salient Features
•	Presents the practice-proven experience of top experts in the field of dialysis treatment. 
•	Offers dialysis guidance for both adult and pediatric patients in one convenient source. 
•	Features a readable hands-on approach, allowing you to quickly review the complicated concepts of dialysis. 
•	Includes helpful annotated bibliography lists in each section for further in-depth research on any subject. 
•	Explains complex dialysis concepts through abundant diagrams, photos, line drawings, and tables. 
New to Edition
•	Features a new 4-color format, enabling you to find the guidance you need more quickly. 
•	Includes coverage of convective dialytic therapies and the results of recent clinical trials. 
•	Ensures that you keep current on pediatric dialysis concerns prevention and treatment with new chapters including prevention and treatment of bone disease, management of anemia, assessing quality of life in pediatric patients undergoing dialysis, and immunizations in children undergoing dialysis.

Title: Evidence-Based Management Of The Acute Coronary Syndrome
Author: রক পিফারি
Summary: Acute coronary syndrome (ACS) is at present the most common clinical entity requiring admission of a patient to an inpatient cardiology service. In the past, evaluation and treatment options for patients with this syndrome were either empirical or based on observational reports of clinical outcomes. It is now generally agreed that to acquire meaningful clinical data, a randomized clinical trial is the best method of clinical research. Over the past few years an ever-increasing number of randomized clinical tests have resulted in a much deeper evidence-based understanding of the pathophysiology, presentation, risk assessment, and management of the acute coronary syndrome and its subsets, i.e., unstable angina, non-Q wave myocardial infarction, and ST elevation/Q-wave infarction. This book organizes the data gleaned from these trials to allow the reader to better understand the best use of individual forms of evaluation and treatment, and how these individual treatments can be best combined to result in optimal patient outcome.
Book_Title: Evidence-Based Management Of The Acute Coronary Syndrome

Title: Liver Immunology
Author: এম. এরিক গার্শউইন
Summary: In LIVER IMMUNOLOGY, the editors bring together experts in a variety of disciplines including immunologists, virologists and hepatologists to discuss the theme of liver disease from basic science through the treatment of patients. There is a heavy emphasis on understanding the best use of pharmaceuticals, the role and place of liver transplantation, and information on emerging drug treatments.

Title: Spinal Imaging: State of the Art
Author: মাউরিসিও ক্যাস্টিলিও এমডি
Book_Title: Spinal Imaging: State of the Art
